thread.section_title: HandmadePiece Art 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 HandmadePiece Art 的点评意见 | www.handmadepiece.com
thread.title: Ian Naghten
thread.title_full: HandmadePiece Art 的点评人 Ian Naghten

author: Ian Naghten
title: Ian Naghten
text: We are very pleased with our work from Handmade Piece...The fact that we were able to see photos of it and able to ask for minor adjustments before it was sent was of immeasurable assistance in getting the result we were after...Communication through Monica was excellent, and the painting arrived, quickly and in excellent condition. From our experience, we have no problem in recommending Handmade Piece
